body: {"title":"The Asterisk War: The Academy City on the Water","year":2015,"ids":{"trakt":97794,"slug":"the-asterisk-war-the-academy-city-on-the-water","tvdb":293996,"imdb":"tt5095466","tmdb":64671,"tvrage":null},"overview":"Invertia was a meteor storm that caused an unprecedented disaster  during the 20th century. Because of this disaster, numerous cities  around the world were destroyed. However, within the meteor, an unknown  element called mana was discovered. It allowed human technology to make  rapid strides giving rise to a new species of super-powered humans, the  Star Pulse Generation (Genestella). The Festas (Star Warrior Festivals)  host battles between Genestella at a city of six academies called  “Rikka,” also commonly known as “Asterisk.”Scholarship student Ayato  Amagiri transferred into Seidoukan Academy in order to fulfill his own  wish, swearing he too will fight in this city.","first_aired":"2015-10-03T13:30:00.000Z","airs":{"day":"Saturday","time":"22:30","timezone":"Asia/Tokyo"},"runtime":24,"certification":"TV-14","network":"ANIMAX","country":"jp","trailer":"https://youtube.com/watch?v=yPf0SNpTjng","homepage":"http://asterisk-war.com","status":"ended","rating":7.09818,"votes":275,"comment_count":3,"updated_at":"2021-05-11T04:36:30.000Z","language":"ja","available_translations":["de","en","es","fr","he","it","ja","ko","pl","pt","uk","zh"],"genres":["action","science-fiction","anime","adventure","fantasy"],"aired_episodes":36}
